Title: Nice Hunter Style Quartz Colibri Pocket Watch with Chain in Gold Tone
Description: PLEASE READ ENTIRE DESCRIPTION BEFORE PURCHASING For Sale: (1) Nice Hunter Style Quartz Colibri Pocket Watch with Chain in Gold Tone Please see pictures for more details! This nice quartz pocket watch features a brushed satin finish with the Hunter style case. This watch does come with a gold tone rope chain at 11" long. The dial is black with gold hands a a small crystal at the 12 o'clock position. The back does pop of for installation of a new battery. This watch is running and is a mechanical hand winding watch. There are a few pits on the front of the watch as shown in the pictures. This is a great piece.
